definitions.title: vb. Niph.
definitions.body: be in, or fall into, heavy sleep (NH id.; cf. Ar. radama stop up (door, gap, etc.), whence perh. be deaf (stopped up) to sounds, etc.);—Pf. 3 ms. [[נִרְדַם]] Ju Jdg 4:21; 1 S. [[נִרְדַּמְתִּי]] Da 8:8; Impf. 3 ms. [[נִרְדֵם]] Jon 1:5; Pt. [[נִרְדָּם]] Pr 10:5 + 3 t.;—be or fall fast asleep: Ju Jdg 4:21, Jon 1:5 (after [[וַיִּשְׁכַב]]), v:Jon 1:6 (pt., Ges:§ 120 b Da:Synt. § 70 (a)); pt. as subst. [[נִרְדָּם בַּקָּחִיר]] Pr 10:5; of sleep of death Ps 76:7; stunning effect of awe and dread Da 8:18, Da 10:9 (both + [[אָָרְחָה]] [[[וּפָנַי]]] [[עַל־פָּנַי]].
